creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: DSWP; two panel, four salvage; indigo field; thirteen bands, three central bands and shoulder band of floral and birds; colors of green, purple, fuscia, yellow, orange, blue, white; no neckline
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
